title.rendered: Elima Presented F/W22 for Paris Fashion Week

content.rendered:
Elima Presented Fall/Winter "Lavela Holiday" collection 2022 for Paris Fashion Week powered by Fashion Division. Elima is a resort wear brand that represents real women with real bodies and convey a message of comfort and confidence. 


By Fashion-editor : Christina V Henningstad  Production: Fashionview

excerpt.rendered: Elima Presented Fall/Winter “Lavela Holiday” collection 2022 for Paris Fashion Week powered by Fashion Division….
